readme:
![Logo](https://github.com/sdir01/immense-project/raw/master/logo.png) # Immense Project UI 1.0 ### Install ```bash $ apm install immense-project-ui ``` ## Description **Immense Project** - Theme that based on stock Atom theme but was developed and built by @sdir01 with new design, this UI was inspired by OS X and Ubuntu design.
This is a public beta of this UI, if you found a bug, glitch or have idea for theme you can report about it in issues tab, and yeah, there is no Preferences (because idk how to add them ðŸ˜‹). ## Screenshots ![Screenshot](https://github.com/sdir01/immense-project/raw/master/screen_one.png) ![Screenshot](https://github.com/sdir01/immense-project/raw/master/screen_two.png) ### Immense Project Syntax This syntax theme was created for Immense Project UI and can be unstable with other themes.
[Immense Project Syntax GitHub page allocated here.](https://github.com/sdir01/immense-project-syntax)
